content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment today. Could I please have your name to get started?
Hi, I'm not sure now if I actually need to schedule. I was going to get my AC looked at but I think I'll hold off.
No problem at all! If you decide you need service in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer changed their mind about needing service
